listener.description: Extend Editor Controller to add Awesome Fonts array to MCE4 dialog

phrases.phrase: Font-Awesome Integration with the Smilies below box ?
This option will integrate the Font-Awesomes icons inside the Smilies below box
Wysiwyg Mode - Font Awesome Root Url

If the inserted Font-Awesome element has no custom formating option, it will be displayed inside the editor with a Wysiwyg mode. To perform this, the Font Awesome stylesheet must be loaded in the editor Iframe. This stylesheet originally has relative urls in it. They will not work inside the iframe: the absolute path is needed.

You can configure here the url of FA (root directory). The default is:
https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/font-awesome/4.3.0

Do not add the last '/'.
Sorry, but you need to provide more data

templates.template: {xen:raw $content} {xen:raw $content} {xen:raw $content} {xen:raw $content}
